newsitem.title: USA: Cisco Systems to acquire Netsys for $79 million.
newsitem.headline: Cisco Systems to acquire Netsys for $79 million.

text.p: - Cisco Systems Inc., a provider of internetworking products, said Monday that it signed a definitive agreement to acquire privately held Netsys Technologies in a stock deal worth $79 million.
Cisco, which has held a minority equity stake in Palo Alto, Calif.-based Netsys since 1995, said Netsys' stockholders will receive $79 million worth of Cisco shares.
Cisco said the acquisition will result in a one-time charge against its after-tax earnings of between 5 and 6 cents a share in its fiscal second quarter of 1997.
The transaction is expected to be completed by next month and is subject to various closing conditions including Netsys shareholder approval.
Netsys' stock was off 25 cents at $65.50 on the Nasdaq market.
